intro.title: Profile
paragraphs: A full stack software engineer based in Beijing. I shape mess into simple, meaningful experiences.
When I'm offline, I'm usually busy with citywalk, gaming and drawing.
Latest portfolio of work available upon request.

items.title: Content Moderation LLM Fine-tuning
items.description: Led fine-tuning of a moderation-focused LLM to improve precision and recall, with SFT and GRPO for business-specific standards.

items.title: Content Moderation Efficiency Initiative
items.description: Led a machine moderation strategy and LLM platform to reduce manual review, improve throughput, and raise review quality.

items.title: LLM-Powered Data Analysis Agent
items.description: Built an LLM agent that answers questions, generates SQL, runs queries, and renders rich visualizations.

items.title: Flowlet - Visual Workflow Orchestration
items.description: A lightweight drag-and-drop workflow system for building and running data-processing pipelines with LLM and API nodes.

items.title: Crowdfunding - Tier-based & Custom Funding
items.description: A flexible crowdfunding system supporting multiple funding tiers, custom contributions, campaign management, and refunds for failed campaigns.

items.title: Gogoga Token - ERC20 Token with Sale
items.description: An ERC20 token implementation with built-in token sale functionality, featuring pausable transfers, minting capabilities, and configurable purchase limits.

items.title: Gogoga NFT - ERC721 Collection with Royalties
items.description: An ERC721 NFT collection with EIP-2981 royalty support, pausable minting, batch operations, and burnable tokens for enhanced creator control.

items.title: Voting System - On-chain Decentralized Voting
items.description: A decentralized voting system with candidate and voter registration, time-limited voting sessions, pausable controls, and transparent result tallying.

items.title: Technical Expert
items.description: Led the development of enterprise-scale web applications, mentored junior developers.

items.title: Java Developer
items.description: Developed and maintained multiple client projects, implemented responsive designs.

items.title: M.S. in Computer Technology
items.description: Developed and maintained multiple client projects, implemented responsive designs.

items.title: B.S. in Computer Technology
items.description: Developed and maintained multiple client projects, implemented responsive designs.
